scripts.check-git-clean: git diff-index --quiet HEAD -- || (echo "You have uncommitted changes. Please commit or stash them."; exit 1)
scripts.bump-version-patch: yarn check-git-clean && yarn increment-package-json-build-number && yarn version --patch --no-git-tag-version && npx react-native-version && yarn commit-version && yarn tag-version
scripts.bump-version-minor: yarn check-git-clean && yarn increment-package-json-build-number && yarn version --minor --no-git-tag-version && npx react-native-version && yarn commit-version && yarn tag-version
scripts.bump-version-major: yarn check-git-clean && yarn increment-package-json-build-number && yarn version --major --no-git-tag-version && npx react-native-version && yarn commit-version && yarn tag-version
scripts.bump-build: yarn check-git-clean && yarn increment-package-json-build-number && npx react-native-version --increment-build && yarn commit-version
scripts.bump-build-and-skip-ci: yarn check-git-clean && yarn increment-package-json-build-number && npx react-native-version --increment-build && yarn commit-version-and-skip-ci
